EmailTemplate.name: HeadStart Hours Extension
EmailTemplate.subject: We want to give you time!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
{!HS_Activity__c.YP_First_name_from_HS_Application_Form__c}! We can see youâ€™ve almost logged the magic 16 hours of volunteering, but you need just a little more time, so we're extending the deadline for an extra week!
We've had a few people ask us if they can use hours they're volunteering outside of their HeadStart placement to access the interviews and workshops. The Answer? OF COURSE YOU CAN! Any volunteering you are doing counts.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also if you still need to volunteer a few more hours you can come and volunteer on an exclusive HeadStart project Saturday 30th January and Saturday 6th February. Sign up Here!
